instruction: Analyze the exhibit below that shows the profitability of global and local firms in the years following the crisis and compare their profit margins.
output: After analyzing the exhibit, it is evident that global firms maintained a higher profit margin compared to local firms in the years following the crisis. Additionally, global firms were able to increase their profit margin during this time period. This highlights the importance of global presence and scale in maintaining and increasing profitability in the aftermath of a crisis.
